subject: Restore PWA debug banner and add alpha label to heading
body:
- Restored PWADebugBanner component and re-added to home screen
- Added "ALPHA" badge next to "SyncTone" heading on both mobile and desktop layouts
- Badge uses primary/gold styling consistent with app theme
